blocks.name: cflem
blocks.content: A lemma used to simplify cofinality computations, showing the existence of the cardinal of an unbounded subset of a set ` A ` . (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm cflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))), wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  mp2ani(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wss(c0, c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))
  ssid(c0)
  rgen(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wss(cv(s2), cv(s2)))
  ssid(cv(s2))
  rspcev(s3, cv(s2), c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  sseq2(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s2))
  spcegv(s1, c0, c1, wa(wss(c0, c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wss(c0, c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))
  sseq1(cv(s1), c0, c0)
  ralbidv(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  rexeq(s3, cv(s1), c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  bitr3i(wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
  exbii(s1, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  mpbiran(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1)))))
  isseti(s0, cfv(ccrd, cv(s1)))
  fvex(ccrd, cv(s1))
  19.41v(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  excom(s1, s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  diff.wss.s(s3, cv(s2), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, c0)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s3, c0, wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  diff.wss.s(s1, cv(s2), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccrd, cv(s1))
  diff.ccrd.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
} = {
  sylib(c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))))), ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))))
  mp2ani(c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))), c0 ⊆ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3)))
  ssid(c0)
  rgen(s2, c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3))
  mpan2(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3), s2 ⊆ s2)
  ssid(s2)
  rspcev(s3, s2, c0, s2 ⊆ s2, s2 ⊆ s3)
  sseq2(s3, s2, s2)
  spcegv(s1, c0, c1, (c0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3))), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3))))
  anbi12d(s1 = c0, s1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)), c0 ⊆ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3)))
  sseq1(s1, c0, c0)
  ralbidv(s2, c0, s1 = c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3), ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3))
  rexeq(s3, s1, c0, s2 ⊆ s3)
  bitr3i(∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))))), ∃(s1, ∃(s0,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))))))
  exbii(s1, ∃(s0,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3))))), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3))))
  mpbiran(∃(s0,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3))))), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3))), ∃(s0, s0 =(card ` s1)))
  isseti(s0, (card ` s1))
  fvex(ccrd, s1)
  19.41v(s0, s0 =(card ` s1), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3))))
  excom(s1, s0, (s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))))
  diff.wss.s(s3, s2, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ⊆ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3)))
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, c0)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s2, c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, s2 ⊆ s3))
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s3, c0, s2 ⊆ s3)
  diff.wss.s(s1, s2, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccrd, s1)
  diff.ccrd.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, s1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3)))
  diff.wss.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s2, c0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1, s2 ⊆ s3))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s3, s1, s2 ⊆ s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, s2, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: cfval
blocks.content: Value of the cofinality function. Definition B of Saharon Shelah, _Cardinal Arithmetic_ (1994), p. xxx (Roman numeral 30). The cofinality of an ordinal number ` A ` is the cardinality (size) of the smallest unbounded subset ` y ` of the ordinal number. Unbounded means that for every member of ` A ` , there is a member of ` y ` that is at least as large. Cofinality is a measure of how "reachable from below" an ordinal is. (Contributed by NM, 1-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  mpdan(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))), wcel(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))), universe))
  sylib(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))), universe), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
  cflem(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, con0)
  intexab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, con0, cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))), universe, ccf, cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))))
  inteqd(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))
  exbidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  raleq(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  df-cf(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.c(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(s2, c0, wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3))))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cff
blocks.content: Cofinality is a function on the class of ordinal numbers to the class of cardinal numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cff() {
  |- wf(ccf, con0, con0)
} = {
  fmpti(hs0, ccf, con0, con0, cint(cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))))))))
  df-cf(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4)
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cint(cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))))))), con0), wss(cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)))))))), con0), wne(cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)))))))), emptycls))
  abssi(hs1, con0, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))))))
  exlimiv(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2)), con0))
  cardon(cv(hs2))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2)), con0)
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wne(cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)))))))), emptycls), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)))))))))
  cflem(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, cv(hs0), con0)
  abn0(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4))))))))
  oninton(cab(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wrex(hs4, cv(hs2), wss(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)))))))))
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)

  diff.hs2.s(hs3)

}

  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c0, con0))

  cfval(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, con0), wss(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))), wss(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))))
  ss2abdv(s0, wcel(c0, con0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))
  eximdv(s1, wcel(c0, con0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  anim2d(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  imdistanda(wcel(c0, con0), wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1))), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1))), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(s1)))))
  dfss3(hs0, c0, cuni(cv(s1)))
  ralimdv(hs0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  3imtr4g(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eximdv(hs1, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wss(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

  intss(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))))
  syl6eqss(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, con0)))
  sylnbir(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cdm(ccf)))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(ccf), con0)
  fdmi(ccf, con0, con0)
  cff()
  ndmfv(c0, ccf)
  0ss(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wss(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)

thm cfub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (cf ` c0)⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((cf ` c0)⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))}, c0 ∈ On)
  eqsstrd((cf ` c0), ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))}, ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))}, c0 ∈ On)
  cfval(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ On, ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))} ⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))}, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))} ⊆ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))})
  ss2abdv(s0, c0 ∈ On, ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1))), ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1))))))
  eximdv(s1, c0 ∈ On, (s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)), (s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))
  anim2d(c0 ∈ On, s0 =(card ` s1), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1))))
  imdistanda(c0 ∈ On, s1 ⊆ c0, c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))
  syl5bi((c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0), c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ⋃ s1))
  dfss3(hs0, c0, ⋃ s1)
  ralimdv(hs0, c0, (c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈ ⋃ s1, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1))
  3imtr4g((c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈ ⋃ s1, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1)), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ s1 ∧ hs0 ⊆ hs1)))
  eximdv(hs1, (c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0), (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1), (hs1 ∈ s1 ∧ hs0 ⊆ hs1))
  ancomsd((c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0), hs0 ∈ hs1, hs1 ∈ s1, (hs1 ∈ s1 ∧ hs0 ⊆ hs1))
  imdistand((c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0), hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ∈ hs1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)
  syl6((c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0), hs1 ∈ s1, (hs0 ∈ hs1 → hs0 ⊆ hs1), hs1 ∈ On)
  sylan9r(c0 ∈ On, s1 ⊆ c0, hs1 ∈ s1, hs1 ∈ On, hs1 ∈ c0)
  ssel(s1, c0, hs1)
  ex(c0 ∈ On, hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ On)
  onelon(c0, hs1)
  onelss(hs1, hs0)
  eluni(hs1, hs0, s1)
  df-rex(hs1, s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)
  intss({ s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))}, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))})
  syl6eqss((cf ` c0), ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))}, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ On)
  sylnbir(c0 ∈ On, (cf ` c0)= ∅, c0 ∈ dom(cf))
  eleq2i(c0, dom(cf), con0)
  fdmi(ccf, con0, con0)
  cff()
  ndmfv(c0, ccf)
  0ss(⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))})
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ s1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ⊆ c0))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(s1)
}

blocks.content: Value of the cofinality function at a limit ordinal. Part of Definition of cofinality of [Enderton] p. 257. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2004.)

thm cflm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wlim(c0)), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wlim(c0), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wlim(c0)), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))), wa(wss(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))), wss(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))), cfv(ccf, c0))))
  jctil(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wlim(c0)), wss(cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))))), wss(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))), cfv(ccf, c0)))
  sseqtr4d(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))), cfv(ccf, c0), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wlim(c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, universe), wlim(c0), wss(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))))))
  syl(wlim(c0), wss(cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))), cint(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))))), wss(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))))
  ss2abdv(s0, wlim(c0), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1)))))))
  eximdv(s1, wlim(c0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cv(s1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s1))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(s1))))))

thm cflm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ Lim(c0))→(cf ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ∈ c1, Lim(c0), (cf ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))}, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c0)), (cf ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))}, ((cf ` c0)⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))} ∧ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))} ⊆(cf ` c0)))
  jctil((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c0)), (cf ` c0)⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))}, ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))} ⊆(cf ` c0))
  sseqtr4d(⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))}, (cf ` c0), ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))}, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c0)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ 𝕌, Lim(c0), ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))} ⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))})
  syl(Lim(c0), ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))} ⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))}, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))} ⊆ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))})
  ss2abdv(s0, Lim(c0), ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1))))), ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1))))
  eximdv(s1, Lim(c0), (s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))), (s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))
  anim2d(Lim(c0), s0 =(card ` s1), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1))), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1))
  imdistanda(Lim(c0), s1 ⊆ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), c0 = ⋃ s1)
  syl6ibr((Lim(c0)∧ s1 ⊆ c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), c0 = ⋃ s1, (c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1 ∧ ⋃ s1 ⊆ c0))
  jctird((Lim(c0)∧ s1 ⊆ c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1, ⋃ s1 ⊆ c0)
  adantr(Lim(c0), s1 ⊆ c0, (∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1))→ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1))
  syl6ibr(Lim(c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ ⋃ s1))
  ralrimdv(hs2, c0, Lim(c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), hs2 ∈ ⋃ s1)
  syl9(Lim(c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), hs2 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ ⋃ s1, suc(hs2)∈ c0)
  biimpd(Lim(c0), hs2 ∈ c0, suc(hs2)∈ c0)
  limsuc(c0, hs2)
  syl6com(∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)), suc(hs2)∈ c0, hs2 ∈ ⋃ s1, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, suc(hs2)⊆ hs1))
  rspcv(hs0, suc(hs2), c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1), ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, suc(hs2)⊆ hs1))
  rexbidv(hs1, s1, hs0 = suc(hs2), hs0 ⊆ hs1, suc(hs2)⊆ hs1)
  sseq1(hs0, suc(hs2), hs1)
  sylibr(∃(hs1 ∈ s1, suc(hs2)⊆ hs1), hs2 ∈ ⋃ s1, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs2 ∈ hs1))
  reximi(hs1, s1, suc(hs2)⊆ hs1, hs2 ∈ hs1)
  elv(hs2, (suc(hs2)⊆ hs1 → hs2 ∈ hs1))
  sucssel(hs2, universe, hs1)
  eluni2(hs1, hs2, s1)
  dfss3(hs2, c0, ⋃ s1)
  imp(Lim(c0), s1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ s1 ⊆ c0)
  syl5ibr(Lim(c0), s1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ s1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ s1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  uniss(s1, c0)
  sseq2d(⋃ s1, c0, ⋃ c0, Lim(c0))
  limuni(c0)
  eqss(c0, ⋃ s1)
  intss({ s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))}, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))})
  syl((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ Lim(c0)), (cf ` c0)= ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))))}, c0 ∈ On)
  limelon(c0, universe)
  cfval(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0)
  sstri((cf ` c0), ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))}, ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))})
  cfub(s0, s1, c0)
  ax-mp(⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))} ⊆ ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))}, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))} ⊆ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))})
  ss2abi(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1))), ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1))))
  eximi(s1, (s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)), (s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))
  anim2i(s0 =(card ` s1), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1), (s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1))
  anim2i(s1 ⊆ c0, c0 = ⋃ s1, c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)
  eqimss(c0, ⋃ s1)
  intss({ s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))}, { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ⋃ s1)))})
  eqss((cf ` c0), ⋂ { s0 | ∃(s1,(s0 =(card ` s1)∧(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c0 = ⋃ s1)))})
  diff.wlim.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wlim.s(s1, c0)
  diff.hs2.w(Lim(c0))
  diff.hs2.w(∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ s1, hs0 ⊆ hs1)))

thm cf0() {
  |- wceq(cfv(ccf, emptycls), emptycls)
} = {
  mpbi(wceq(cfv(ccf, emptycls), emptycls), wss(cfv(ccf, emptycls), emptycls))
  sseqtri(cfv(ccf, emptycls), emptycls, cint(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1)))))))))
  cfub(hs0, hs1, emptycls)
  eqtri(cint(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1)))))))), emptycls, cint(csn(emptycls)))
  inteqi(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1))))))), csn(emptycls))
  eqtr4i(cab(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1))))))), csn(emptycls), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  abbii(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  3bitri(wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, emptycls)))
  exbii(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1)))))
  anbi1ci(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  bitr3i(wa(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  biantru(wss(cv(hs1), emptycls), wss(emptycls, cuni(cv(hs1))))
  0ss(cuni(cv(hs1)))
  ss0b(cv(hs1))
  ceqsexv(hs1, emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, emptycls)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs1)), cfv(ccrd, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), emptycls, ccrd)
  eqeq2i(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, emptycls), emptycls)
  card0()
  df-sn(hs0, emptycls)
  intsn(emptycls)
  0ex()
  ss0b(cfv(ccf, emptycls))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)

thm cf0() {
  ⊢ (cf ` ∅)= ∅
} = {
  mpbi((cf ` ∅)= ∅, (cf ` ∅)⊆ ∅)
  sseqtri((cf ` ∅), emptycls, ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(hs1,(hs0 =(card ` hs1)∧(hs1 ⊆ ∅ ∧ ∅ ⊆ ⋃ hs1)))})

blocks.name: cfle
blocks.content: Cofinality is bounded by its argument. Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 102. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfle(class c0) {
  |- wss(cfv(ccf, c0), c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wcel(c0, con0))
  syl5ss(cfv(ccf, c0), c0, cfv(ccrd, c0), wcel(c0, con0))
  cflecard(c0)
  cardonle(c0)
  syl6eqss(cfv(ccf, c0), c0, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, con0)))
  sylnbir(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cdm(ccf)))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(ccf), con0)
  fdmi(ccf, con0, con0)
  cff()
  ndmfv(c0, ccf)
  0ss(c0)
}

blocks.name: cfon
blocks.content: The cofinality of any set is an ordinal (although it only makes sense when ` A ` is an ordinal). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)

blocks.name: cfeq0
blocks.content: Only the ordinal zero has cofinality zero. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2013.)

blocks.name: cff1
blocks.content: There is always a map from ` ( cf `` A ) ` to ` A ` (this is a stronger condition than the definition, which only presupposes a map from some ` y ~~ ( cf `` A ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2013.)

blocks.name: cfflb
blocks.content: If there is a cofinal map from ` B ` to ` A ` , then ` B ` is at least ` ( cf `` A ) ` . This theorem and ~ cff1 motivate the picture of ` ( cf `` A ) ` as the greatest lower bound of the domain of cofinal maps into ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:

  intss1(hs1, { hs1 | ∃(hs2,(hs1 =(card ` hs2)∧(hs2 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ hs2, s1 ⊆ hs0)))))})

blocks.name: cfval2
blocks.content: Another expression for the cofinality function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), ciin(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cfv(ccf, c0), ciin(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), cint(cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))), wcel(c0, con0))
  cfval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0)
  eqtr2i(cint(cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))), ciin(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))))))
  dfiin2(s0, hs0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))
  fvex(ccrd, cv(s0))
  inteqi(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))))), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))))
  abbii(hs0, wrex(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))
  bitri(wrex(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))))))
  df-rex(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  anbi2ci(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  rabid(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  selpw(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cv(s0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: coflim
blocks.content: A simpler expression for the cofinality predicate, at a limit ordinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm coflim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wb(wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  ralrimdv(s0, c0, wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  syl9r(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c1)))
  biimprd(wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c1)))
  eleq2(cuni(c1), c0, cv(s0))
  syl5bi(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c1)), wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eluni2(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  reximdvai(s1, c1, wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  syl6(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), con0))
  expr(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), con0))
  syl2an(wlim(c0), wa(wss(c1, c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), con0), word(c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  limord(c0)
  ssel2(c1, c0, cv(s1))
  ordelon(c0, cv(s1))
  onelss(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  3expia(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cuni(c1), c0))
  eqtr4d(cuni(c1), c0, cuni(c0), w3a(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  eqssd(cuni(c1), cuni(c0), w3a(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  3ad2ant2(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  uniss(c1, c0)
  3ad2ant3(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)))
  uniss2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3ad2ant1(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(c0, cuni(c0)))
  limuni(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0))

thm coflim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→(⋃ c1 = c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), ⋃ c1 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1)))
  ralrimdv(s0, c0, (Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), ⋃ c1 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1))
  syl9r((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), ⋃ c1 = c0, s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1), s0 ∈ ⋃ c1)
  biimprd(⋃ c1 = c0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ ⋃ c1)
  eleq2(⋃ c1, c0, s0)
  syl5bi((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), s0 ∈ ⋃ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ s1))
  eluni2(s1, s0, c1)
  reximdvai(s1, c1, (Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), s0 ∈ s1, s0 ⊆ s1)
  syl6((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), s1 ∈ c1, (s0 ∈ s1 → s0 ⊆ s1), s1 ∈ On)
  expr(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ On)
  syl2an(Lim(c0), (c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), s1 ∈ On, Ord(c0), s1 ∈ c0)
  limord(c0)
  ssel2(c1, c0, s1)
  ordelon(c0, s1)
  onelss(s1, s0)
  3expia(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1)), ⋃ c1 = c0)
  eqtr4d(⋃ c1, c0, ⋃ c0, (Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1))))
  eqssd(⋃ c1, ⋃ c0, (Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1))))
  3ad2ant2(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1)), ⋃ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  uniss(c1, c0)
  3ad2ant3(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1)), ⋃ c0 ⊆ ⋃ c1)
  uniss2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  3ad2ant1(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 ⊆ s1)), c0 = ⋃ c0)
  limuni(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0)
  diff.wlim.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, ⋃ c1, c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0)
  diff.wlim.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c1, c0)
}

  -| wcel(c0, universe)

  df-rex(s0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))))
  exbidv(s0, wlim(c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))

  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))))
  anbi2d(wlim(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ccrd, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  syl5bb(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wral(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))

thm cflim3(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (Lim(c0)→(cf ` c0)= ⋂(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 },(card ` s0)))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((cf ` c0), ⋂(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 },(card ` s0)), ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0,(hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2)))))}, Lim(c0))
  syl(Lim(c0), (cf ` c0)= ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0,(hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2)))))}, c0 ∈ On)
  sylibr(Lim(c0), c0 ∈ On, Ord(c0))
  limord(c0)
  elon(c0)
  cfval(hs0, s0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  syl5req(⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0,(hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2)))))}, ⋂(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 },(card ` s0)), ⋂ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, hs0 =(card ` s0))}, Lim(c0))
  dfiin2(s0, hs0, { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, (card ` s0))
  fvex(ccrd, s0)
  inteqd({ hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, hs0 =(card ` s0))}, { hs0 | ∃(s0,(hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2)))))}, Lim(c0))
  abbidv(hs0, Lim(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, hs0 =(card ` s0)), ∃(s0,(hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2))))))
  syl5bb(Lim(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, hs0 =(card ` s0)), ∃(s0,(hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2))))), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 } ∧ hs0 =(card ` s0))))
  df-rex(s0, { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, hs0 =(card ` s0))
  exbidv(s0, Lim(c0), (s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 } ∧ hs0 =(card ` s0)), (hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2)))))
  syl5bb(Lim(c0), (s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 } ∧ hs0 =(card ` s0)), (hs0 =(card ` s0)∧(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2)))), (hs0 =(card ` s0)∧ s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }))
  ancom(s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, hs0 =(card ` s0))
  anbi2d(Lim(c0), hs0 =(card ` s0), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2))))
  syl5bb(Lim(c0), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ s0 = c0 }, (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2))), (s0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ s0 = c0))
  rabid(s0, P(c0), ⋃ s0 = c0)
  syl5bb(Lim(c0), (s0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ s0 = c0), (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2))), (s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ s0 = c0))
  anbi1i(s0 ∈ P(c0), ⋃ s0 = c0, s0 ⊆ c0)
  selpw(s0, c0)
  pm5.32da(Lim(c0), s0 ⊆ c0, ⋃ s0 = c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ s0, hs1 ⊆ hs2)))

thm cflim2(class c0) {
  |- wb(wlim(c0), wlim(cfv(ccf, c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  impbii(wlim(c0), wlim(cfv(ccf, c0)))
  mpbid(wlim(c0), wlim(cfv(ccf, c0)), wss(com, cfv(ccf, c0)))
  sseqtr4d(com, cfv(ccf, c0), ciin(hs0, crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0))), wlim(c0))
  sylibr(wlim(c0), wss(com, ciin(hs0, crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wss(com, cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wlim(c0), wss(com, cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0))))
  sylan2b(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wss(com, cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  rabid(hs0, cpw(c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))
  3expb(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wss(com, cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0))))
  syl3an2b(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wss(com, cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  sylibr(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wss(com, cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0))), wn(wcel(cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0)), com)))
  mtand(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cfv(ccrd, cv(hs0)), com), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cep), cv(hs2))))))
  mtbid(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(cep), cv(hs2))))), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  nrexdv(hs2, cv(hs0), w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  sylnib(wa(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wss(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))
  mtbird(wa(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), wss(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)), wss(c0, cv(hs2)))
  mtand(wa(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), wss(c0, cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  sylan(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wn(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs0), con0))
  mtod(wa(wss(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))
  3syl(wa(wss(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs2), con0), word(cv(hs2)))
  ssel2(cv(hs0), con0, cv(hs2))

blocks.name: cfom
blocks.content: Value of the cofinality function at omega (the set of natural numbers). Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 102. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jun-2015.)

thm cfslb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0)), wbr(cfv(ccf, c0), cdom, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  syl2anc(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0)), wbr(cfv(ccf, c0), cdom, c1), wbr(cfv(ccf, c0), cdom, cfv(ccrd, c1)), wbr(cfv(ccrd, c1), cen, c1))
  mpsyl(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0)), wbr(cfv(ccf, c0), cdom, cfv(ccrd, c1)), wcel(cfv(ccrd, c1), universe), wss(cfv(ccf, c0), cfv(ccrd, c1)))

thm cfslb(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0)→(cf ` c0)[≼]c1)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  syl2anc((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0), (cf ` c0)[≼]c1, (cf ` c0)[≼](card ` c1), (card ` c1)[≅]c1)
  mpsyl((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0), (cf ` c0)[≼](card ` c1), (card ` c1)∈ 𝕌, (cf ` c0)⊆(card ` c1))
  fvex(ccrd, c1)
  3impib(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 = c0, (cf ` c0)⊆(card ` c1))
  syl5ibr(Lim(c0), (c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0), (cf ` c0)⊆(card ` c1), ⋂(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 },(card ` hs0))⊆(card ` c1))
  syl((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0), ⋂(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 },(card ` hs0))⊆(card ` c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 },(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1)))
  mpan2((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 },(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1)), (card ` c1)⊆(card ` c1))
  ssid((card ` c1))
  sylibr(((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0)∧(card ` c1)⊆(card ` c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 },(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1)), ∃(hs0,((hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ hs0 = c0)∧(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1))))
  mpcom(((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0)∧(card ` c1)⊆(card ` c1)), ∃(hs0,((hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ hs0 = c0)∧(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1))), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ad2antrr(c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 = c0, (card ` c1)⊆(card ` c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  spcegv(hs0, c1, universe, ((c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0)∧(card ` c1)⊆(card ` c1)), ((hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ hs0 = c0)∧(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ hs0 = c0), (card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1), (c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0), (card ` c1)⊆(card ` c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ P(c0), ⋃ hs0 = c0, c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 = c0)
  syl5bb(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ P(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆ c0)
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  sseq1(hs0, c1, c0)
  eqeq1d(⋃ hs0, c0, ⋃ c1, hs0 = c1)
  unieq(hs0, c1)
  sseq1d((card ` hs0), (card ` c1), (card ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, ccrd)
  bitri(∃(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 },(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1)), ∃(hs0,((hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ hs0 = c0)∧(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1))), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 } ∧(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1))))
  df-rex(hs0, { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 }, (card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1))
  exbii(hs0, (hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 } ∧(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1)), ((hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ hs0 = c0)∧(card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1)))
  anbi1i(hs0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P(c0)| ⋃ hs0 = c0 }, (card ` hs0)⊆(card ` c1), (hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ ⋃ hs0 = c0))

blocks.name: cfslbn
blocks.content: Any subset of ` A ` smaller than its cofinality has union less than ` A ` . (This is the contrapositive to ~ cfslb .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfslbn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
} = {
  3impia(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))
  con4d(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)), wcel(cuni(c1), c0))
  syld(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(cuni(c1), c0)), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))), wceq(cuni(c1), c0))
  ord(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cuni(c1), c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0))
  mpbid(wa(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0)), wo(wcel(cuni(c1), c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0)), wss(cuni(c1), c0))
  imp(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wss(cuni(c1), c0))
  syl5ibr(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wss(cuni(c1), c0), wss(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  uniss(c1, c0)
  sseq2d(cuni(c1), c0, cuni(c0), wlim(c0))
  limuni(c0)
  imp(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wb(wss(cuni(c1), c0), wo(wcel(cuni(c1), c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0))))
  syl6(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wb(wss(cuni(c1), c0), wo(wcel(cuni(c1), c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0))), wa(word(cuni(c1)), word(c0)))
  jctird(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), word(cuni(c1)), word(c0))
  syl6(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), word(cuni(c1)), wss(c1, con0))
  syl5com(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wss(c1, con0), wss(c0, con0))
  syl(wlim(c0), wss(c0, con0), word(c0))
  ordsson(c0)
  sstr2(c1, c0, con0)
  ssorduni(c1)
  limord(c0)
  ordsseleq(cuni(c1), c0)
  3expia(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))))
  syl(w3a(wlim(c0), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cuni(c1), c0)), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))), wbr(cfv(ccf, c0), cdom, c1))
  cfslb(c0, c1)
  domnsym(cfv(ccf, c0), c1)
}

thm cfslbn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c1[≺](cf ` c0))→ ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  3impia(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, c1[≺](cf ` c0), ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)
  con4d((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), c1[≺](cf ` c0), ⋃ c1 ∈ c0)
  syld((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), ¬ ⋃ c1 ∈ c0, ¬ c1[≺](cf ` c0), ⋃ c1 = c0)
  ord((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), ⋃ c1 ∈ c0, ⋃ c1 = c0)
  mpbid((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0), (⋃ c1 ∈ c0 ∨ ⋃ c1 = c0), ⋃ c1 ⊆ c0)
  imp(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 ⊆ c0)
  syl5ibr(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 ⊆ ⋃ c0)
  uniss(c1, c0)
  sseq2d(⋃ c1, c0, ⋃ c0, Lim(c0))
  limuni(c0)
  imp(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, (⋃ c1 ⊆ c0 ↔(⋃ c1 ∈ c0 ∨ ⋃ c1 = c0)))
  syl6(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, (⋃ c1 ⊆ c0 ↔(⋃ c1 ∈ c0 ∨ ⋃ c1 = c0)), (Ord(⋃ c1)∧ Ord(c0)))
  jctird(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, Ord(⋃ c1), Ord(c0))
  syl6(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, Ord(⋃ c1), c1 ⊆ On)
  syl5com(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, c1 ⊆ On, c0 ⊆ On)
  syl(Lim(c0), c0 ⊆ On, Ord(c0))
  ordsson(c0)
  sstr2(c1, c0, con0)
  ssorduni(c1)
  limord(c0)
  ordsseleq(⋃ c1, c0)
  3expia(Lim(c0), c1 ⊆ c0, ⋃ c1 = c0, ¬ c1[≺](cf ` c0))
  syl((Lim(c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ ⋃ c1 = c0), ¬ c1[≺](cf ` c0), (cf ` c0)[≼]c1)
  cfslb(c0, c1)
  domnsym((cf ` c0), c1)
}

blocks.name: cfslb2n
blocks.content: Any small collection of small subsets of ` A ` cannot have union ` A ` , where "small" means smaller than the cofinality. This is a stronger version of ~ cfslb . This is a common application of cofinality: under AC, ` ( aleph `` 1 ) ` is regular, so it is not a countable union of countable sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfslb2n(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))))), wi(wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)), wne(cuni(c1), c0)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  necon2ad(cuni(c1), c0, wa(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))))), wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)))
  3syld(wa(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))))), wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))), wceq(ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))), c0), wbr(cfv(ccf, c0), cdom, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cuni(cv(s0))))))))
  sylc(wa(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))))), wi(wceq(cuni(c1), c0), wceq(ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))), c0)), wss(cuni(c1), ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0))))), wss(ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))), c0))
  imp(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)))), wss(cuni(c1), ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0))))))
  syl6(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)))), wss(cuni(c1), ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wss(cv(s0), csuc(cuni(cv(s0))))))
  ralimdv(s0, c1, wlim(c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))), wss(cv(s0), csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))))
  adantrd(wlim(c0), wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)), wss(cv(s0), csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))))
  syl6(wlim(c0), wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))), wss(cv(s0), con0))
  3syl(wlim(c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), con0)), word(c0), wss(c0, con0))
  ordsson(c0)
  expcom(wss(c0, con0), wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), con0))
  sstr(cv(s0), c0, con0)
  onsucuni(cv(s0))
  syl5eqss(cuni(c1), ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))), ciun(s0, c1, cv(s0)), wral(s0, c1, wss(cv(s0), csuc(cuni(cv(s0))))))
  uniiun(s0, c1)
  ss2iun(s0, c1, cv(s0), csuc(cuni(cv(s0))))
  imp(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)))), wss(ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))), c0))
  syl6ibr(wlim(c0), wral(s0, c1, wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0)))), wss(ciun(s0, c1, csuc(cuni(cv(s0)))), c0), wral(s0, c1, wss(csuc(cuni(cv(s0))), c0)))
  ralimdv(s0, c1, wlim(c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))), wss(csuc(cuni(cv(s0))), c0))
  sylsyld(wlim(c0), wa(wss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cfv(ccf, c0))), wss(csuc(cuni(cv(s0))), c0), word(c0), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  limord(c0)

blocks.name: cofsmo
blocks.content: Any cofinal map implies the existence of a strictly monotone cofinal map with a domain no larger than the original. Proposition 11.7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 101. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.w((s3 ` s2)⊆(c2 ` s2))

}

thm cfsmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wsmo(cv(s0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, cfv(ccf, c0), wss(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  cfsmolem(s0, s1, s2, hs1, hs0, c0, cmpt(hs2, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))), cres(crecs(cmpt(hs2, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))), cfv(ccf, c0)))
  cbvmptv(hs2, s1, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))), cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(s1))), ciun(hs0, cdm(cv(s1)), csuc(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  uneq12d(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))), cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(s1))), ciun(hs0, cdm(cv(s1)), csuc(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s1)))
  fveq2d(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2)), cdm(cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s1)))

  cbviunv(hs3, hs0, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs3), cv(hs0)), wceq(csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  suceq(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))
  iuneq12d(hs0, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), cdm(cv(s1)), csuc(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s1)))
  dmeq(cv(hs2), cv(s1))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(s1)), wceq(csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  fveq1(cv(hs2), cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  suceq(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cres(crecs(cmpt(hs2, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))), cfv(ccf, c0)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.cres.s(s0, crecs(cmpt(hs2, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))), cfv(ccf, c0))
  diff.crecs.s(s0, cmpt(hs2, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))))

  diff.crecs.s(s1, cmpt(hs2, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs2, universe, cun(cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))))))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccf, c0)

  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cun.s(s2, cfv(cv(hs1), cdm(cv(hs2))), ciun(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), csuc(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))))

thm cfsmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On → ∃(s0,((s0 :(cf ` c0)→ c0)∧ Smo(s0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈(cf ` c0), s1 ⊆(s0 ` s2))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  cfsmolem(s0, s1, s2, hs1, hs0, c0, (hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))), (recs((hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))))|`(cf ` c0)))
  cbvmptv(hs2, s1, universe, ((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))), ((hs1 ` dom(s1))⋃ ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(s1), suc((s1 ` hs0)))))
  uneq12d((hs1 ` dom(hs2)), ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))), (hs1 ` dom(s1)), ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(s1), suc((s1 ` hs0))), hs2 = s1)
  fveq2d(hs1, dom(hs2), dom(s1), hs2 = s1)
  syl5eq(⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))), ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(s1), suc((s1 ` hs0))), ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs0))), hs2 = s1)
  cbviunv(hs3, hs0, dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)), suc((hs2 ` hs0)))
  syl(hs3 = hs0, suc((hs2 ` hs3))= suc((hs2 ` hs0)), (hs2 ` hs3)=(hs2 ` hs0))
  fveq2(hs3, hs0, hs2)
  suceq((hs2 ` hs3), (hs2 ` hs0))
  iuneq12d(hs0, dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs0)), dom(s1), suc((s1 ` hs0)), hs2 = s1)
  dmeq(hs2, s1)
  syl(hs2 = s1, suc((hs2 ` hs0))= suc((s1 ` hs0)), (hs2 ` hs0)=(s1 ` hs0))
  fveq1(hs2, s1, hs0)
  suceq((hs2 ` hs0), (s1 ` hs0))
  eqid((recs((hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))))|`(cf ` c0)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.cres.s(s0, recs((hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))))), (cf ` c0))
  diff.crecs.s(s0, (hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs2, universe, ((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, (hs1 ` dom(hs2)), ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, hs1, dom(hs2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, hs3, dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, hs2)
  diff.csuc.s(s0, (hs2 ` hs3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, hs2, hs3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccf, c0)

  diff.cres.s(s1, recs((hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))))), (cf ` c0))
  diff.crecs.s(s1, (hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs2, universe, ((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))))

  diff.crecs.s(s2, (hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))))
  diff.cmpt.s(s2, hs2, universe, ((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))))
  diff.universe.s(s2)

  diffss.ex(s2, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, ccf, c0)
  diff.ccf.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((hs2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs1 ` dom(hs2))⋃ ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))))
  diff.hs2.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.c(((hs1 ` dom(s1))⋃ ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(s1), suc((s1 ` hs0)))))
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cun.s(s1, (hs1 ` dom(hs2)), ⋃(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3))))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, hs1, dom(hs2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.ciun.s(s1, hs3, dom(hs2), suc((hs2 ` hs3)))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, hs2)
  diff.csuc.s(s1, (hs2 ` hs3))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, hs2, hs3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)

  diff.hs3.c(suc((hs2 ` hs0)))

blocks.name: cfcoflem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cfcof , showing subset relation in one direction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfcoflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c1, c0), wsmo(cv(s0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wss(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))), wss(cfv(ccf, c0), cfv(ccf, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  sylan9r(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c1, c0), wsmo(cv(s0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wss(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))), wss(cfv(ccf, c0), cfv(ccf, c1)), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cfv(ccf, c1), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(hs1, cfv(ccf, c1), wss(cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))
  syl(wcel(c1, con0), wi(wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), c1, c0), wsmo(cv(s0)), wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wss(cv(s1), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))), wex(hs0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), cfv(ccf, c1), c0), wral(s1, c0, wrex(hs1, cfv(ccf, c1), wss(cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))), wex(hs2, wa(wf1(cv(hs2), cfv(ccf, c1), c1), wral(s2, c1, wrex(hs1, cfv(ccf, c1), wss(cv(s2), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))))))
  cff1(hs2, s2, hs1, c1)

blocks.name: coftr
blocks.content: If there is a cofinal map from ` B ` to ` A ` and another from ` C ` to ` A ` , then there is also a cofinal map from ` C ` to ` B ` . Proposition 11.9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 102. A limited form of transitivity for the "cof" relation. This is really a lemma for ~ cfcof . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2013.)

blocks.name: cfcof
blocks.content: If there is a cofinal map from ` A ` to ` B ` , then they have the same cofinality. This was used as Definition 11.1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 100, who defines an equivalence relation cof ` ( A , B ) ` and defines our ` cf ( B ) ` as the minimum ` B ` such that cof ` ( A , B ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cfidm
blocks.content: The cofinality function is idempotent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: alephsing
blocks.content: The cofinality of a limit aleph is the same as the cofinality of its argument, so if ` ( aleph `` A ) < A ` , then ` ( aleph `` A ) ` is singular. Conversely, if ` ( aleph `` A ) ` is regular (i.e. weakly inaccessible), then ` ( aleph `` A ) = A ` , so ` A ` has to be rather large (see ~ alephfp ). Proposition 11.13 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 103. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)
